review: The firestick worked right out of the box. After setting up the wifi connection it worked flawlessly. The only problem I had was with Youtube videos that were cropped, but this seems to be a more general problem that was fixed. I am pretty happy with the device and have been enjoying videos, etc. I highly recommend the firestick.

review: Beware!!!!!!!!  If you sign up for Sling TV to receive this for free this thing will devour your data.  If your internet provider puts a cap on your monthly data use, this will use it up in a few days.  I went over 250GB in one weekend watching Sling TV.  Sling TV does not give refunds.  Read the fine print before you sign up for the offer.
